document_api_meta.title: Get Affiliate Partner Campaign Product List
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API offers the ability to list products submitted by sellers in an Affiliate Partner campaign.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The partner access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 3. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3978f4c20311b8b555) to get partner access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: category_asset_cipher
request_query_param.desc: The partner identifier used in API requests. Retrieve this value by using the [Get Authorized Category Assets API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/666012dd609d4402cc3be995).

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: review_status
request_query_param.desc:
The product review status. This an enumerated type with values:
- PENDING
- APPROVED
- REJECTED
- PENDING_CLOSED
- CLOSED

request_query_param.name: product_name
request_query_param.desc: Filter the product list by product name. If value of `product_name` is contained in `product.name`, the product will be included in the response.

request_query_param.name: product_id
request_query_param.desc: Filter the product list by product ID. If value of `product_id` matches `product.id`, the product will be included in the response.

request_query_param.name: shop_name
request_query_param.desc: Filter the product list by shop name. If value of `shop_name` is contained in `product.shop_name`, the product will be included in the response.

request_query_param.name: category_id
request_query_param.desc: Filter the product list by category ID. If value of `category_id` matches `product.category.id`, or the product falls into the leaf category of the specified category, the product will be included in the response.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^products
response_param.desc: The list of products.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^review_status
response_param.desc:
The product review status. This an enumerated type with values:
- PENDING
- APPROVED
- REJECTED
- PENDING_CLOSED
- CLOSED

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.example: test case number 4 test case number 4
response_param.desc: The product name.

response_param.name: ^^main_image_url
response_param.desc: The product image URL.

response_param.name: ^^lowest_price
response_param.desc: The lowest original price of all SKUs of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency in the sales region.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The lowest price amount.

response_param.name: ^^highest_price
response_param.desc: The highest original price of all SKUs of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code for the region in which the product is sold.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The highest price amount.

response_param.name: ^^inventory
response_param.desc: The number of in-stock units of all SKUs for this product.

response_param.name: ^^shop_name
response_param.desc: The TikTok Shop name.

response_param.name: ^^total_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The total commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.

response_param.name: ^^creator_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The creator commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.

response_param.name: ^^partner_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The partner commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.

response_param.name: ^^open_collaboration_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The product open collaboration commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.

response_param.name: ^^is_available
response_param.desc: Set to `true` if a product URL is available. Set to `false` if no product URL is available.

response_param.name: ^^product_sales
response_param.desc: The total number of units sold of this product for this campaign.

response_param.name: ^^category
response_param.desc: The leaf category to which this product is associated.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The category identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The category name.

response_param.name: ^^sample_quota
response_param.desc: The total amount of sample inventory available for allocation to creators by the seller.

response_param.name: ^^sku_information_list
response_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_name
response_param.desc: The name of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^sku_id
response_param.desc: The id of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^inventory
response_param.desc: SKU inventory details.

response_param.name: ^^^^available_quantity
response_param.desc: The total SKU quantity available in the warehouse.

response_param.name: ^^^base_price
response_param.desc: the base price of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^^region_code
response_param.desc: the region code of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc:
The currency of the SKU price.
Possible values based on the region:
- BRL:  Brazil
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japan
- MXN: Mexico
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

response_param.name: ^^^^list_price
response_param.desc: The SKU's list price information that has been verified to be legitimate by the audit team. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).

response_param.name: ^^^^sale_price
response_param.desc:
The SKU's selling price, inclusive of tax.
Applicable only for cross-border sellers from China.

response_param.name: ^^^^localized_dutiable_price
response_param.desc: localized dutiable price

response_param.name: ^^^region_prices
response_param.desc: region prices

response_param.name: ^^^^region_code
response_param.desc: the region code of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^^sale_price

The SKU's selling price, inclusive of tax.
Applicable only for cross-border sellers from China.

response_param.name: ^^^^localized_dutiable_price
response_param.desc: localized dutiable price

response_param.name: ^^^properties
response_param.desc: The properties of the sku

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: the name of the property

response_param.name: ^^^^value_name
response_param.desc: the name of the value

response_param.name: ^^product_description
response_param.desc: Return product description

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total number of products in the list.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliatePartner202405GetAffiliatePartnerCampaignProductListGet() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliatePartnerV202405API.AffiliatePartner202405CampaignsCampaignIdProductsGet(context.Background(), "7373988288167036678")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.CategoryAssetCipher("GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3")
    request = request.PageSize(10)
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.ReviewStatus("PENDING")
    request = request.ProductName("sample")
    request = request.ProductId("1730305356901683547")
    request = request.ShopName("Test Shop")
    request = request.CategoryId("991496")
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including view campaign list and details and campaign product list and details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including your contact information, campaign list and details, and campaign product list and details.
